The basic needs of any ETV station is power approaching maximum
eip and even more important a very tall tower. From studio
point of view: adequate camera chains, film projection chains
and video tape recorders.
We have two microwave installations; both give us considerable
trouble. We feed KOED-TV in Tulsa ( some 92 miles away) direct¬
ly from KETA-TV. Engineers said this couldn’t be done but we
are doing it quite successfully. Signal is excellent 99% of the
time.
So-called regional and even state networks can wait until local
funds are available; meanwhile, with adequate videotape recorders
an exchange of programs can be worked out most successfully*
Let’s stick to the basic items in the Roberts Bill and not endanger
it’s passage with fringe area stuff#
